snippet: In a replay of an attempt by pro-Palestinian activists to reach Bethlehem last July, most appeared to have been stopped before they boarded flights to Israel.
abstract: Israel blocks scores of pro-Palestinian campaigners from entering the country by providing the airlines with the names of hundreds of people who the government said would face immediate deportation; officials brand the activists as provocateurs, bent on causing disorder, but organizers say they had no plans to stage demonstrations.
lead_paragraph: In a replay of an attempt by pro-Palestinian activists to reach Bethlehem last July, most appeared to have been stopped before they boarded flights to Israel.

headline.seo: Israel Moves to Block Activists’ Entry Into Nation
headline.main: Israel Moves to Block Activists From Entering
headline.print_headline: Israel Moves to Block Activists From Entering the Country
